## Description

Populate project with GitHub copilot agents and instructions to help with the code generation.

Add:

- Agents

1. Dev
Reads issue detail and generates codes
Works on revision after reviewer reviews the codes
3. Reviewer
Reviews code after Dev with some pre-defined rules
Suggests code changes and best practices
4. TPO
Generates issue details
Generates plan for implementation
Asks questions about the issues

- Templates
1. Story detail
2. Review
3. Revision
4. Commit message
 
- Unitwise project details markdown files in a folder(eg: docs)
